# Chair for Federal Heritage Conference Room
## Tender Announcement

### Tender Details

| **Title** | **English** | **French** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| Title  | Chair for Federal Heritage Conference Room | Fauteuil pour salle de conférence fédérale du patrimoine |
| Reference Number | PW-22-01008616 | - |
| Amendment Number | 0 | - |
| Solicitation Number | 23-228523 | - |

### Tender Information

* **Publication Date**: 2022-09-28
* **Tender Closing Date**: 2022-10-11T14:00:00 (Expired)
* **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services (GD)
* **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open bidding (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)

### Contractor Requirements

* **Product Category**: Office Furniture (Meubles de bureau)
* **Specific Product Requirements**: Rotary Chair (Fauteuil rotatif)

### Trade Agreements

* This tender is open to suppliers who are registered under one or more of the following trade agreements:
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement (Accord de libre-échange Canada-Panama)
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (Accord de libre-échange Canada-Chili)
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (Accord de libre-échange canadien)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (Accord de libre-échange Canada-Colombie)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (Accord de libre-échange Canada-Corée)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement (Accord de libre-échange Canada-Honduras)
